question: Deployment manifest with nodeSelector disktype=ssd.
suggested_answer:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: app
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: scheduled
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: scheduled
    spec:
      nodeSelector:
        disktype: ssd
      containers:
      - name: nginx
        image: nginx
